name: Don't Get Hit (TOPHATs64_GAMEs)
description:
Controls:

A - Move Right

D - Move Left

Space - Boost

Objetctive - Dont Get Hit

If you are playing this game when its first released and would like to leave some information as to how the game experience went, there is a questionare available by following this link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ki_gcoi5z_F4LhXfw6gQhOd_Rpi0LBt5gtkUHHNeCko/...
